title: Google Pixel 3xl USB- C Headphones - volume increasing/dropping on its own - please help!
content: Hi, I am experiencing issues with my Google Pixel 3xl packaged USB-C headphones. Whenever I am watching/listening to content, the volume will randomly increase/decrease on its own accord. I have tried turning off Google Assistant and I have also booted in Safe Mode (problem still occurs in Safe Mode) - I have also tried turning airplane mode on, WiFi off, mobile data off etc. and the problem still occurs. PLEASE HELP!
